attributes.action: Have no Muzzles and Leads on so called "status dogs” in public places.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
PLEASE SIGN REMEMBER THERE IS NO SUCH THING OF A BAD DOG ONLY BAD OWNERS, and i think most of you will agree on that, its people who need to educated not the dogs.

Proposals are said to include :

Powers for police, dog wardens and Police Community Safety Officers to penalise offenders for:

Not keeping a dog on a lead.

Not putting, and keeping, a dog on a lead when directed to do so by an authorised officer.

 A general amnesty for dogs considered to be dangerous, whether they are banned or not, 
All 'status' dogs be both muzzled and on a lead in a public place.

REMEMBER IF YOUR NOT PART OF THE SOLUTION, YOUR PART OF THE PROBLEM. KEEP SPREADING THE WORD.. 【ツ】!!!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to have no Muzzles and Leads on so called "status dogs” in public places..

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=NOMuzzlesNOLeads



Her Majesty's Government
